text: The men's hammer throw event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 15 and 16 July. A 6 kg (junior implement) hammer was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Andrey Azarenkov ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Mohsen
